name: Angelic Melody
description:
You are an angel and you have to collect as much music notes as you can. If you miss any notes depending on your life bar once it reaches 0 its game over. Up arrow is to move up (W), down arrow is to move down (S), left arrow to move left (A), and right arrow to move right(S).

Credits

Art & SFX: Orblus

Coding: ShawnTheSheep

Music: Whitesand - Drops
